summary:
Makes Vampire armors (normal, royal, boots, gauntlets, hood), vampire swords, common clothing and Bone Hawk Ring craftable at forge. Also adds new standalone retextured armors.
Requires Dawnguard.
Light, Heavy and Mage clothing varieties.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367430962.png [/img]
[color=red] Author: [/color] ThunderTNT
[color=red] Requirements: [/color] Dawnguard, Latest Skyrim patch


[list] This mod consists of three different separate plugins.
[*]Craftable Vampire Armory
[*]Craftable Vampire Jewelry
[*]Craftable Bone Hawk Ring[/list]

These files have been bundled into single download for easy Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) install.
[color=yellow] If you only want to use one or two of the plugins, you can simply deactivate the one you do not want in plugins tab of NMM [/color]


Details about each plugin are below


[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431001.png [/img]
Craftable Vampire Armory plugin makes all Vampire light armors and Harkon's sword craftable at forge
I hava also added 6 new retextured Royal Vampire armors and a retextured Vampire sword
and made heavy armor and mage clothing versions, which look the same as existing vampire light armors


[list] [color=green] Features: [/color]
[*]Unique ID:s, no changes made to original armors/weapons
[*]Light, Heavy and Mage versions of armors, Light and heavy armors and swords are temperable
[*]work for both Male/Female and beast races
[*]Full Set bonus for crafted armors, found armors do not count towards full set (sorry) (Light/Heavy armor)
[*]Any texture/mesh replacers for original vampire armors and harkon's sword will work (Retextured armors, hood and master vampire sword are unaffected)[/list]


[heading] Craftables [/heading]


Light armors: [color=yellow] Forge category: Leather [/color]
Vampire Boots
Vampire Gauntlets
[list] Vampire Armor
[*]Red
[*]Black
[*]Grey [/list]
Vampire Hood [color=red] (New) [/color]
[list] Vampire Royal Armor
[*]Red[*]Valerica [color=red] (New, Female only) [/color]
[*]Black [color=red] (New) [/color]
[*]Grey [color=red] (New) [/color]
[*]Green [color=red] (New) [/color]
[*]Blue [color=red] (New) [/color]
[*]Purple [color=red] (New) [/color]
[*]Brown [color=red] (New) [/color][/list]


Heavy armors: [color=red] (New) [/color] [color=yellow] Forge category: Iron [/color]
Vampire Boots
Vampire Gauntlets
[list] Vampire Armor
[*]Red
[*]Black
[*]Grey [/list] Vampire Hood
[list] Vampire Royal Armor
[*]Red
[*]Valerica (Female only)
[*]Black
[*]Grey
[*]Green
[*]Blue
[*]Purple
[*]Brown[/list]


Clothes: [color=yellow] Forge category: Miscellaneous [/color]
Vampire Robes
Vampire Shoes
Vampire Gloves


Mage clothing: [color=red] (New) [/color] [color=yellow] Forge category: Miscellaneous [/color]
Vampire Boots
Vampire Gauntlets
[list] Vampire Armor
[*]Red
[*]Black
[*]Grey [/list] Vampire Hood
[list] Vampire Royal Armor
[*]Red
[*]Valerica (Female only)
[*]Black
[*]Grey
[*]Green
[*]Blue
[*]Purple
[*]Brown[/list]


Weapons:
Vampire Sword [Steel] (Harkon's sword) [color=yellow] Forge category: Steel [/color] [color=red] Requires perk: Steel Smithing [/color]
Master Vampire Sword [Ebony] [color=red] (New) [/color] [color=yellow] Forge category: Ebony [/color] [color=red] Requires perk: Ebony Smithing [/color]


[heading] Main file and optionals [/heading]


[list] [color=green] Main file [/color]
[*]Vampire armors and weapons craftable [color=red] only at Castle Volkihar forge [/color]
[*]Vampire quest line requirement: [color=red] You must choose to accept Harkon's gift [/color] to be able to craft armors/weapons
[*]Royal armors and hood craftable [color=red] after Chasing Echoes [/color] is completed
[*]Master vampire sword craftable [color=red] after Kindred Judgement [/color] is completed[/list]


Optionals: [color=yellow] (Separate download) [/color]


[list] [color=yellow] Override (B) [/color]
[*]No Vampire Quest line requirement[*]Vampire Armors and weapons [color=red] craftable at any forge [/color]
[*]Royal armors and hood craftable [color=red] after Chasing Echoes [/color] is completed
[*]Master vampire sword craftable [color=red] after Kindred Judgement [/color] is completed
[*]Recipes use snowberries instead of potion of blood[/list]


[list] [color=red] Complete Override (C) [/color]
[*]No Vampire Quest line requirement[*]All Vampire Armors and weapons craftable [color=red] at any forge at any time [/color]
[*]Recipes use snowberries instead of potion of blood[/list]


[list] Circlet under Hood
[*]You are able to wear circlet under vampire hood
[*]Main file, Override and Complete Override plugins[/list]


[list] Also thanks to Illoyd, who created a replacer .esp for main file, that adds enchanted versions of Royal Mage Armor and hood
It can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61020/?]here[/url]
[*]This file still requires you to download my mods main file[/list]


[heading] Notes: [/heading]
[list]
[*]Full set bonus only applies to crafted armors and shows up as Nightingale Full Set bonus on Active Effects tab
[*]You can mix and match light and heavy vampire armors and nightingale armors for full set bonus
[*]Beast races wearing circlet under hood may see minor clipping depending on circlet
[*]If another mod makes vampire armors and sword craftable, you might have multiple entries for same item in crafting menu[/list]


[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431048.png [/img]


Craftable Vampire Jewelry plugin makes 4 special vampire rings and 4 special vampire amulets craftable without their enchantments


[list] [color=green] Features [/color]
[*]Unique ID:s, do not conflict with other mods[/list]

Jewelry: [color=yellow] Forge category: Jewelry [/color]
[list] Vampire Ring
[*]Gold/Ruby
[*]Silver/Ruby
[*]Bronze/Emerald
[*]Ebony/Sapphire[/list]

Vampire Amulet [list]
[*]Gold/Ruby
[*]Silver/Ruby
[*]Bronze
[*]Ebony[/list]


[list] [color=green] Main file [/color]
[*]Rings and amulets craftable [color=red] only at Castle Volkihar forge [/color]
[*]Vampire quest line requirement: [color=red] You must choose to accept Harkon's gift [/color] to be able to craft rings and amulets[/list]

[list] [color=red] Override [/color] [color=yellow] (Separate download) [/color]
[*]No Vampire Quest line requirement
[*]Rings and amulets craftable [color=red] at any forge at any time [/color][/list]


[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431287.png [/img]


Craftable bone hawk ring plugin makes Bone Hawk Ring craftable
and also adds retextured light armor version of Bone Hawk Amulet


[list] [color=green] Features [/color]
[*]Unique ID:s, do not conflict with other mods, however if another mod adds bone hawk ring, you might get multiple entries in forge menu
[*]New retextured Bone Hawk Amulet with light armor rating[/list]

Jewelry: [color=yellow] Forge category: Jewelry [/color]
Bone Hawk Ring
Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet [color=red] (New) [/color]


[list] [color=green] Main file [/color]
[*]Ring and amulet craftable [color=red] only at Castle Volkihar forge [/color]
[*]Vampire quest line requirement: [color=red] You must choose to accept Harkon's gift [/color] to be able to craft ring and amulet[/list]

[list] [color=red] Override [/color] [color=yellow] (Separate download) [/color]
[*]No Vampire Quest line requirement[*]Ring and amulet craftable [color=red] at any forge at any time [/color]
[*]Blooded bone hawk amulet recipe uses snowberries instead of potion of blood[/list]


[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431077.png [/img]


[heading] NMM install [/heading] [list=1]
[*]Download CVA-CVJ-CBHR Bundle with NMM
[*]Activate mod in mods tab
[*]Deselect plugins you don't want in plugins tab
THCraftableVampireArmory.esp for armors and weapons
THCraftableVampireJewelry.esp for special vampire rings and amulets
THBoneHawkRingCraftable.esp for Bone Hawk Ring and Blooded amulet
[/list]

[heading] NMM uninstall [/heading] [list=1]
[*]Deactivate CVA-CVJ-CBHR Bundle with NMM
[/list]

[heading] Manual install [/heading] [list=1]
[*]Download CVA-CVJ-CBHR Bundle archive
[*]Unpack archive
[*]Put the following files from the archive to Skyrim/Data folder
THCraftableVampireArmory.esp
THCraftableVampireArmory.bsa
THCraftableVampireJewelry.esp
THBoneHawkRingCraftable.esp
THBoneHawkRingCraftable.bsa
[*]Activate .esp:s you want with NMM or by going to Skyrim Launcher's Data files.
[/list]

[heading] Manual uninstall [/heading] [list=1]
[*]Delete following files from Skyrim/Data folder
THCraftableVampireArmory.esp
THCraftableVampireArmory.bsa
THCraftableVampireJewelry.esp
THBoneHawkRingCraftable.esp
THBoneHawkRingCraftable.bsa
[/list]

[heading] Override installation [/heading] [list=1]
[*]Download CVA-CVJ-CBHR Overrides archive (manual download)
[*]Choose what you want to override and put .esp into Skyrim/Data folder
[*]Choose Yes, when asked to overwrite
[/list]

[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431116.png [/img]
[heading] Future updates [/heading]
-Bug fixes, if needed (no known major bugs at the moment)

[heading] Changelog [/heading]

[color=red] Craftable Vampire Armory [/color]

1.6
-Bundle version, no changes
1.5
-All craftable armors now use unique ID
-Crafted armor full set bonus for vampire armors
1.4
-2 new retextured royal armors
-2 Vampire swords
1.3
-New Vampire Hood ground model and fixed Khajiit/Argonian Hood)
-4 new Vampire Royal armors (retextured)
-Heavy and clothing versions of the armors
1.2
-Quest requirements for armors
-Valerica's Robes for females
-Vampire Hood
1.1
-Vampire armors craftable at Castle Volkihar forge
1.0
-Vampire Royal armor craftable and temperable


[color=red] Craftable Bone Hawk Ring [/color]

1.6
-Bundle version, no changes
1.3
-Retextured model for Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet
1.2
-Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet (Light armor)
-Quest line requirements
1.1
-Bone Hawk Ring craftable at Castle Volkihar forge


[color=red] Craftable Vampire Jewelry [/color]

1.6
-4 new vampire rings, 4 new vampire amulets
-Initial release in Bundle version

[heading] Other [/heading]
Feedback concerning this mod is greatly appreciated, feel free to comment on what do you think about this mod, what should be improved etc.

I would like to give my thanks for:
Bethesda, for creating such a great game as Skyrim and providing a Creation Kit for it
Nexus, for a great modding community!
Nexus users, for giving me ideas on how to further enhance this mod

[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431141.png [/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32531] Craftable Dawnguard Armory [/url]
author: ThunderTNT

files.name: UnEnchTemperRoyalArmorAndBoneHawkRingCraft
files.changelogHtml:
Adds a temperable unenchanted Vampire Royal Armor
Adds craftable Bone Hawk Ring

files.name: THBoneHawkRingCraftable1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Made separate downloads for Vampire Armory and Bone Hawk Ring
Vampire Armors (Red, Black, Gray, Royal Red, Boots, Gauntlets and Hood) are now craftable
Vampire Clothing (Robes, Boots, Gloves) now craftable
Armors, clothing and Bone Hawk Ring now only craftable at Castle Volkihar forge

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory
files.changelogHtml:
Made separate downloads for Vampire Armory and Bone Hawk Ring
Vampire Armors (Red, Black, Gray, Royal Red, Boots, Gauntlets and Hood) are now craftable
Vampire Clothing (Robes, Boots, Gloves) now craftable
Armors, clothing and Bone Hawk Ring now only craftable at Castle Volkihar forge

files.name: THVampireRoyalArmorFrom1_0to1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added .esp for those who wish to keep their armor from 1.0 but update to 1.1
THVampireRoyalArmorUnenchanted_BoneHawkRingCraftable.esp no longer contains Bone Hawk Ring.

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_1b
files.changelogHtml:
Added optional .esp for those who wish to craft normal vampire armors and clothing at every forge
Vampire Royal Armor and Vampire Hood still only craftable at Castle Volkihar forge

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Vampire armors and clothes can only be crafted if choosing Vampire quest line (Accept Harkon\'s gift)
Vampire Royal Armors and Vampire Hood can only be crafted after completing quest Chasing Echoes
Added Valerica\'s version of Vampire Royal Armor (Purple)
Bone Hawk Ring crafting condition change (Vampire quest line)
Added Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_2b
files.changelogHtml:
Added optional override .esp for 1.2
Craft normal armors and clothes at every forge
Craft Royal armors and hood at Volkihar Castle forge after chasing echoes
No vampire quest line requirement for crafting

files.name: THBoneHawkRingCraftable1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Vampire armors and clothes can only be crafted if choosing Vampire quest line (Accept Harkon\'s gift)
Vampire Royal Armors and Vampire Hood can only be crafted after completing quest Chasing Echoes
Added Valerica\'s version of Vampire Royal Armor (Purple)
Bone Hawk Ring crafting condition change (Vampire quest line)
Added Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ground Model for Serana\'s Hood and fixed hood for argonians and khajiits
Added 4 new Vampire Royal Armors for both male and female
Mage clothing and Heavy armor versions of all armors
File uses now bsa for custom models and textures for this mod
Retextured Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet

files.name: THBoneHawkRingCraftable1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ground Model for Serana\'s Hood and fixed hood for argonians and khajiits
Added 4 new Vampire Royal Armors for both male and female
Mage clothing and Heavy armor versions of all armors
File uses now bsa for custom models and textures for this mod
Retextured Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_3b_Override
files.changelogHtml:
Added override version
Craft normal armors and clothes at every forge
Revised Red armor recipes
No vampire quest line requirement for crafting

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_3c_CompleteOverride
files.changelogHtml:
Complete Override version
Every armor from this mod craftable at every forge
Revised Red armor recipes
No quest requirements

files.name: THBoneHawkRingCraftable1_3b2Override
files.changelogHtml:
Added optional override .esp for THBoneHawkRingCraftable 1.3
Bone Hawk Ring and Blooded Bone Hawk Amulet craftable at every forge
No Vampire Quest line requirement
Revised recipe for Blooded Amulet

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory1_4
files.changelogHtml:
2 new retextured Royal armors (Light Gray and Brown)
Vampire Sword (steel) and Master Vampire sword (Ebony)
Override, Complete Override and Circlet under hood versions in Optionals archive

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory 1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Unique ID:s for Light armors: Vampire armor (Red, Black and gray), gauntlets and boots for increased compability with other mods
Crafted Full armor set bonus for vampire armors (There are limitations for this)
Override, Complete Override and Circlet under hood versions in Optionals archive

files.name: THCraftableVampireArmory 1_5 SkyReBalanced
files.changelogHtml:
Adjusted light and heavy armor stats of crafted armors to match SkyRe's changes.
Adjusted Vampire's sword and Master vampire's sword to match SkyRe
Works only for main file 1.5

files.name: CVA-CVJ-BHRC-Bundle 1_6
files.changelogHtml:
Craftable Vampire Armory, Bone Hawk Ring Craftable and new Craftable Vampire Jewelry bundled into single download
NMM installation is now easier
Craftable Vampire Jewelry adds 4 new vampire rings and 4 new vampire amulets

files.name: CVA-CVJ-BHRC-Bundle 1_6 Optionals
files.changelogHtml:
Craftable Vampire Armory, Bone Hawk Ring Craftable and new Craftable Vampire Jewelry bundled into single download
NMM installation is now easier
Craftable Vampire Jewelry adds 4 new vampire rings and 4 new vampire amulets
